synopsis.text: Yuxi, a kind-hearted and gifted young woman, finds herself constantly battling societal prejudices due to her appearance. After enduring numerous emotional setbacks, she begins to contemplate the transformative power of plastic surgery. When a charming plastic surgeon offers to help her attain beauty, Yuxi seizes the opportunity, hoping it will bring her happiness and acceptance. However, as she embarks on this life-altering journey, she discovers that beauty may not be the key to happiness she had once believed. Unbeknownst to her, a sinister plot is unfolding, threatening to control her newfound life. Will Yuxi find the happiness she yearns for, or will she become a pawn in a conspiratorial game?
